strings.Value: "Candlemere is shrouded by mystery. Perhaps I should recount the history of this place in an article... or even an entire book!"
"The real mystery is how the hell we continue to put up with such an unbearable, pompous buffoon. Or why, for that matter."
"Stupid ruins, freaking lights... This is total bullshit. Better you write about our war with those stinky trolls."
"A fine idea, Jubilost! Let us join forces and write that book together! But not just a single book â€” we could pen a whole series!"
